dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my gosh, you saw this, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my gosh, you saw this, right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: I did! I literally, like, just opened it, and I was like, seriously?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I did! I literally, like, just opened it, and I was like, seriously?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Seriously! The President had to tell the governor to, uh, make sure the lights are on at night?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Seriously! The President had to tell the governor to, uh, make sure the lights are on at night?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Head of State set a number of tasks for the akim "to ensure city lighting in the evening, timely and full supply of water to city residents' apartments, and improvement of streets and courtyards."

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! Like, city lighting? Isn't that, um, just standard?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! Like, city lighting? Isn't that, um, just standard?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: And water supply! Timely and full supply. Like, you'd think that's, uh, just a given.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And water supply! Timely and full supply. Like, you'd think that's, uh, just a given.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Head of State set a number of tasks for the akim "to ensure city lighting in the evening, timely and full supply of water to city residents' apartments, and improvement of streets and courtyards."

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! And improving streets and courtyards, like, that's just basic city maintenance, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! And improving streets and courtyards, like, that's just basic city maintenance, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Head of State set a number of tasks for the akim "to ensure city lighting in the evening, timely and full supply of water to city residents' apartments, and improvement of streets and courtyards."

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Uh, yeah! And then the "Taza Kazakhstan" campaigns, landscaping. Oh, and streamlining traffic! Like, come on.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh, yeah! And then the Taza Kazakhstan campaigns, landscaping. Oh, and streamlining traffic! Like, come on.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In addition, Tokayev pointed out the need for proper implementation of regular "Taza Kazakhstan" campaigns, landscaping the city and streamlining traffic in order to improve environmental friendliness, as well as addressing other issues of concern to residents of the metropolis.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: It's almost like a to-do list for, um, a new intern, not a whole city's governor.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's almost like a to-do list for, um, a new intern, not a whole city's governor.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! And to "restore proper order." Like, what was happening before?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! And to restore proper order. Like, what was happening before?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The akim was instructed to strengthen management activities to restore proper order in the largest city, strengthen its status as a financial, sports, tourism and cultural hub of the country.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: I know, right? And the big kicker, strengthening its status as a financial, sports, tourism, and cultural hub! All while, like, making sure the lights are on.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know, right? And the big kicker, strengthening its status as a financial, sports, tourism, and cultural hub! All while, like, making sure the lights are on.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The akim was instructed to strengthen management activities to restore proper order in the largest city, strengthen its status as a financial, sports, tourism and cultural hub of the country.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: It's just, it's so much! But then the best part: reporting every two weeks.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's just, it's so much! But then the best part: reporting every two weeks.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It is reported that the akim of Almaty will report once every two weeks on the work carried out and the measures taken directly to the Head of State.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Directly! Yes, exactly! Like, a school project update. Every two weeks to the President himself!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Directly! Yes, exactly! Like, a school project update. Every two weeks to the President himself!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It is reported that the akim of Almaty will report once every two weeks on the work carried out and the measures taken directly to the Head of State.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Can you imagine that meeting? "Yes, sir, the lights were mostly on last night."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Can you imagine that meeting? Yes, sir, the lights were mostly on last night.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, for sure! "And, uh, the water, it flowed, sir!"
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, for sure! And, uh, the water, it flowed, sir!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: I mean, it's just wild, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I mean, it's just wild, right?
